comment: Prof. Jia is super nice and always willing to help but his accent is so thick I really only understood him in his emails.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: his class was super easy and his tests were really straightforward. the only thing is that his lectures can be boring, but you don't even have to go. as long as you go to his class before the test when he does a review session, you pass the tests. he will legit give answers from the tests during class. he has a slight accent, but you get used to it
